level.heading: Compensation.
level.text: Members of each board and advisory committee shall be entitled to receive compensation in accordance with ยง 1-611.08, and in addition shall be reimbursed for reasonable travel and other expenses incurred in the performance of their duties.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-99
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-99, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 3-1201.01.
